item.description:
RUGBY. Heard of it? Like it? Love it? Know about it? - want to??
The Amoskeag Club has teams to fit everyone: youth, women, men and Old Boys. We practice in the greater Manchester area with matches here as well as nearby states.
Our newly formed Women's team is looking for women of all skill levels and abilites who want to learn and play Rugby.
Our successful and skilled mens team has a rich history here and just celebrated their 25th Anniversary; they also welcome new players of any skill level and ability.
If you want to learn and play Rugby, meet some fun people and get a great workout too, you're in the right place!
Also, look for us and become a fan on Facebook!
We look forward to meeting you!
item.name: Amoskeag Rugby
